meanings.definition: To trim, shape, and paint the nails on the feet.
meanings.sent1: She pedicured her toenails before going to the beach.
meanings.sent2: It is important to regularly pedicure your feet to keep them healthy.
meanings.sent3: After she pedicured her nails, she felt like she could conquer the world.
meanings.sent4: Her perfectly pedicured toes danced gracefully in the sand.
meanings.sent5: The sound of her pedicured nails clicking on the floor echoed through the room.

meanings.sent1: Her pedicured feet looked beautiful in the sandals.
meanings.sent2: The spa offers a special treatment for pedicured clients.
meanings.sent3: He felt pampered and pedicured after the relaxing spa visit.
meanings.sent4: The pedicured garden was a sight to behold, with perfectly trimmed hedges.
meanings.sent5: The pedicured paws of the dog left tiny imprints in the soft soil.
